SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.screens

Class Minimap

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.screens.Minimap
public class Minimap extends Object
The Minimap class represents a 2D overview of the game world, showing discovered rooms as images arranged in a grid layout. Each room corresponds to a position in the minimap grid and can be dynamically updated depending on whether the player has discovered it. The minimap supports scaling (zoom in/out), panning centered on the player's current position, and rendering only the visible rooms within the current viewport. Each minimap image is represented as a com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image}.

  • Constructor Details

    • Minimap

      public Minimap(int screenHeight, int screenWidth)
      Creates a new Minimap with the given screen dimensions.
      Parameters:
      screenHeight - the height of the screen in pixels
      screenWidth - the width of the screen in pixels

    • Minimap

      public Minimap(int screenHeight, int screenWidth, Map<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2,String> grid)
      Creates a new Minimap using predefined room grid data.
      Parameters:
      screenHeight - the height of the screen in pixels
      screenWidth - the width of the screen in pixels
      grid - a map of grid coordinates to room names

    • Minimap

      public Minimap(int screenHeight, int screenWidth, String filepath)
      Creates a new Minimap using predefined config file.
      Parameters:
      screenHeight - the height of the screen in pixels
      screenWidth - the width of the screen in pixels
      filepath - a path to the config file

  • Method Details

    • addRoom

      public boolean addRoom(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 coordinates, String roomName)
      Adds a room to the minimap at the specified grid coordinates. Each grid coordinate can only hold one room, and each room name must be unique across the minimap.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the grid coordinates (integer x, y) of the room
      roomName - the name of the room
      Returns:
      true if the room was successfully added, false otherwise

    • render

      public Map<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2,String> render()
      Renders the minimap and returns a map of visible room images and their on-screen positions. This method computes which rooms are currently visible based on the minimap's center and scale.
      Returns:
      a mapping of images to their on-screen positions in pixels

    • zoom

      public void zoom(float percentage)
      Zooms the minimap in or out by a specified percentage. Requires: percentage is in the range (-100, infinity)
      Parameters:
      percentage - the percentage to zoom (positive = zoom in, negative = zoom out)

    • getScale

      public float getScale()
      Returns the current zoom scale of the minimap.
      Returns:
      the minimap scale factor

    • pan

      public void pan(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 vector)
      Pans the images across by moving the centre of the minimap area. It will shift the images across by the number of screen pixels specified in vector.
      Parameters:
      vector - magnitude and direction of pixel shift when panning.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the minimap zoom back to its default (scale = 1) and centres on the player again.

    • open

      public void open()
      Opens (initializes) the minimap by centering on the middle of the current room. All discovered rooms have their image changed from the locked image to their respective images.

    • getCentre

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getCentre()
      Returns the centre of the minimap.
      Returns:
      The centre of the minimap as a Vector2

    • close

      public void close()
      Handles closing of the minimap.
